Params: {1: '1', 3: 'The simulation begins, and they see the girl with purple hair walking alone on the screen. Not far ahead of Echo stands a familiar Construct with pink hair waving the paintbrush in her hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Oh? You're choosing Ayla as the data sample for the first simulation?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Indeed. Ayla and Echo had encountered each other in Constellia before. She is the best choice to kickstart this simulation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'I wonder what kind of story will happen to them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "According to the program, Ayla will block Echo's path forward until she passes Ayla's test.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Ayla is a very positive person. I placed this variable here to see if this kind of personality will affect Echo in any way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Are there any prospects we can decide? Perhaps we can choose the state in which Echo approaches Ayla.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "I haven't designed such a program. All I did was enter their data samples into the simulation machine. Everything they do afterward is based on the codes in their samples.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "I want to mimic Echo's potential encounters on the surface as closely as possible...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo has already come face to face with Ayla on the screen of the simulation machine.'}
